text: Estonian Youth Theater (previously known as ENSV National Puppet Theater, Estonian Puppet Theater, Estonian Puppet and Youth Theater, NUKU theater ) is the only national professional theater in Estonia based on puppetry and visual theater. It was started in 1952 by Ferdinand Veike, who led it for nearly 30 years. It is in the Old Town of Tallinn. ==References== Category:1952 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Estonia Category:Organizations based in Tallinn Category:Theatres Category:Puppets Category:Buildings and structures in Estonia
title: Estonian Youth Theatre
